text: Hariharan is an Indian Playback Singer from Trivandrum, whose has been prominently singing for Tamil and Hindi cinema. He is also an established Ghazal singer and has been Awarded the National Award for Two times alongside he was given the Padma Shri award by the Government of India in 2004.https://web.archive.org/web/20151015193758/http://mha.nic.in/sites/upload_files/mha/files/LST- PDAWD-2013.pdf ==References== Category:Indian singers Category:1955 births Category:Living people
title: Hariharan (singer)
